features.title: Enable tools during active conversations
features.description: Allow users to activate web search and other tools mid-conversation for better research capabilities
features.ai_core_comment: This is a test comment from AI Core team. We are working on this feature and expect to ship it in Q2.

features.title: Complete file data recognition
features.description: Improve file reading to capture all data, not just partial content (e.g., full date ranges)

features.title: Enhanced Excel analysis
features.description: Better column recognition, data point handling, and support for complex table structures

features.title: Arabic text support in charts
features.description: Fix Arabic text rendering in graphs and ensure proper right-to-left text display

features.title: Arabic CSV export fix
features.description: Resolve text corruption issues when downloading Arabic content as CSV files

features.title: Optimize response processing
features.description: Prevent infinite loops and improve response completion reliability

features.title: Expandable context window
features.description: Allow for longer, more detailed responses when needed

features.title: Robust Python data conversion
features.description: Fix random Python errors during numeric data type conversions

features.title: Improve API performance for large risk generation requests
features.description: Optimize server response time when generating 10+ risks in a single request to prevent 504 Gateway Timeout errors

features.title: Multi-table Excel recognition
features.description: Recognize and process multiple separate tables within single Excel files, especially when stacked vertically

features.title: Reliable Excel file generation
features.description: Fix Excel file generation to prevent redirect errors and ensure proper file downloads

features.title: Persistent citation system
features.description: Ensure citations remain visible throughout conversations and don't disappear from generated responses

features.title: Citation compatibility with Markdown tables
features.description: Fix markdown table rendering when citations are applied to entire tables vs individual cells

features.title: Shared agent file access
features.description: Enable shared agents to read and access files uploaded by the original creator

features.title: Multiple simultaneous web search queries
features.description: Support running multiple web searches in parallel for comprehensive research without query failures

features.title: Arabic text support in data interpreter
features.description: Fix Arabic text rendering in data interpreter tool to prevent letter flipping and ensure proper right-to-left display

features.title: Workflow input field recognition
features.description: Improve workflow system to properly read and process user input fields

features.title: Chat-level data interpreter activation
features.description: Make data interpreter tools accessible directly from chat interface without requiring agent configuration

features.title: File upload during agent creation
features.description: Add option to upload files from local device during agent creation or editing process

features.title: tips & tricks
features.description: Needs documentation for for tips & tricks in ai core
features.ai_core_comment: Created, will be shared with all users

features.title: test
features.description: test

internal_work_items.title: LLM as Judge Pipeline
internal_work_items.description: Building MLflow + automated evaluation pipeline for testing model outputs. This will help all teams validate their AI implementations with consistent, automated testing.

internal_work_items.title: HR Service Integration
internal_work_items.description: Building integration with HR systems to enable AI Core to assist with employee data, policies, and HR-related queries while maintaining privacy and security.

internal_work_items.title: Policy Comparison MCP Tool
internal_work_items.description: Developing Model Control Protocol tool for comparing and analyzing different policies. This will help teams quickly identify differences and similarities in policy documents.

internal_work_items.title: User Dashboard
internal_work_items.description: Creating comprehensive user dashboard for AI Core usage analytics, performance metrics, and user management. This will help all teams understand how their work impacts users.

internal_work_items.title: Run.AI Cluster Installation
internal_work_items.description: Setting up new Run.AI cluster for improved model training and inference capabilities. This infrastructure upgrade will benefit all teams using AI models.

internal_work_items.title: Vision Model Deployment
internal_work_items.description: Deploying and integrating vision models for image analysis, document processing, and visual content understanding across AI Core applications.

internal_work_items.title: Training Toolkits
internal_work_items.description: Developing comprehensive training materials and toolkits to help teams effectively use AI Core. Including documentation, tutorials, and best practices guides.

internal_work_items.title: GEP Use Case Testing Library
internal_work_items.description: Creating specialized testing library for Government and Enterprise use cases. Ensuring AI Core meets compliance and security requirements for public sector deployments.

internal_work_items.title: Code Assurance Archetypes
internal_work_items.description: Building testing frameworks for code generation and review capabilities. Ensuring AI Core can generate, review, and validate code across different programming languages and patterns.

internal_work_items.title: Preamble to capture stc tone & brand
internal_work_items.description: Developing preamble to ensure AI Core responses match stc's communication style and brand voice across all interactions.

cohere_items.title: API crash on >10 risks
cohere_items.description: Server returns 500 error when generating more than 10 risks in a single request

cohere_items.description: Recognize and process multiple separate tables within single Excel files

cohere_items.title: Data Interpreter not activating

cohere_items.title: Performance optimizations
cohere_items.description: Implemented several performance improvements for large document processing
